title: Skilled — Independent Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 495)
summary: This page provides information about the Skilled — Independent Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 495), which is now closed to new applications. It explains what the visa allows, its duration, relevant obligations, and options available to family members of current visa holders.

visa_for_family_members.description: Members of the visa holder's family unit might be able to get the Skilled – Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) if they want to join the holder in Australia.

allows_holder_to: become eligible to apply for permanent residence
travel in and out of Australia any number of times while the visa is valid

events_to_report: changes to phone number, email, address, or passport
change_notification_requirements.consequence_of_not_reporting_passport_ch: significant delays at the airport and possible denial of permission to board a plane
